text: K. N. Pradhan (1932 – 17 July 1999) was a prominent social and political worker and a well-known and active trade unionist. He was member of Eighth Lok Sabha representing Bhopal parliamentary constituency of Madhya Pradesh. Earlier, He was a member of the Madhya Pradesh Legislative Assembly from 1967 to 1972 and from 1980 to 1985. He also served as Cabinet Minister in the Government of Madhya Pradesh from 1969 to 1972. Pradhan is survived by five children. His son, Vinod Pradhan, is married to Alka Pradhan (née Alka Sahai) daughter of Late Sheeta Sahai a leader of Bhartiya Janta Party. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:1999 deaths Category:8th Lok Sabha members Category:Lok Sabha members from Madhya Pradesh Category:Madhya Pradesh MLAs 1967–1972 Category:Madhya Pradesh MLAs 1980–1985 Category:Politicians from Bhopal
title: K. N. Pradhan
